Description: You fill the air with spinning daggers in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within Range. A creature takes 4d4 slashing damage when it enters the spellâ€™s area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
AtHigherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd Level or higher, the damage increases by 2d4 for each slot Level above 2nd.
